testcase.brief: IP-session correlative mgt0 test (delete mgt0's ip).
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: -Laptop has been associated with AP1 and assigned an ip address -Laptop uses user-profile "FW"
Test Procedure: 1) Config ip-policy which permit Laptop's ip_address "ip-policy FW" "ip-policy FW from/to <Laptop ip addr> action permit" "user-profile FW security ip-policy from/to-access FW" "ssid <ssid_name> default-user-profile-attr [num]" 2) Laptop ping AP1 3) Check the ip-session table on AP1 4) Delete the mgt0's ip "no intface mgt0 ip" 5) Check the ip-session table on AP1

step.console: -v "interface mgt0 vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface mgt0 native-vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface mgt0 ip ${mgt0.test.ip}/24" -v "security-object ${ssid.name}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name} default-user-profile-attr 1" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} security-object ${ssid.name}" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "user-profile ${user_id} qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${tb.vlan1} attribute 1" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} manage all" -v "service telnet protocol 6 timeout 300"

step.desc: "_ff id 1 dst-ip Laptop's IPaddr bidirectional" "_kdebug fe basic" "_kdebug fe detail" "clear log buffered"
step.telnet: -v "_ff id 1 src-ip ${sta1.tif.ip} bidirectional" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail" -v "clear log buffered"

step.desc: Configure a ip-policy and bind it to FW: "ip-policy FW" "ip-policy FW from/to <Laptop ip addr> action permit" "user-profile FW security ip-policy from/to-access FW"
step.telnet: -v "ip-policy ${user_id}" -v "ip-policy ${user_id} id 1 from ${sta1.tif.ip} action permit" -v "ip-policy ${user_id} id 2 to ${sta1.tif.ip} action permit" -v "user-profile ${user_id} security ip-policy from-access ${user_id} to-access ${user_id}" -v "clear forwarding-engine ip-sessions" -v "clear log buffered"

step.desc: Check the ip-session table on AP1

step.log-match: -b "\(u\) mgt0 ${sta1.tif.ip}->${mgt0.test.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -ps p " ACL: matched upid \[\d+\] dir \[ingress \(from-air\)\] group \[FWtest\] id \[1\] \[permit\]" -e "\(i\) wifi0.1 ${sta1.tif.ip}->${mgt0.test.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

step.desc: no _kdebug fe basic no _kdebug fe detail _kdebug fe session clear log buffered
step.telnet: -v "no _kdebug fe basic" -v "no _kdebug fe detail" -v "_kdebug fe session" -v "clear log buffered"

step.desc: Check the ip-session table on AP1
